amendment.description: To authorize military-to-military exchanges with India.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4344 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 4344 proposed by Senator McCain for Senator Sullivan. (consideration: CR S3488-3490; text: CR S3490) To authorize military-to-military exchanges with India.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4344 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4344 proposed by Senator McCain for Senator Sullivan.
